title: Software Development Intern - Backend
description: Join Google's backend engineering team to work on scalable cloud infrastructure. You'll collaborate with senior engineers to design and implement high-performance APIs that serve millions of users globally. This role offers hands-on experience with cutting-edge distributed systems.
responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain backend services using Python and Java
- Design RESTful APIs for internal tools
- Optimize database queries for performance
- Participate in code reviews and team standups
- Write unit and integration tests
eligibility: Currently pursuing B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science or related field. Strong foundation in data structures and algorithms required.

title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Work with Flipkart's frontend team to build engaging user interfaces for India's largest e-commerce platform. You'll create responsive web applications that millions of users interact with daily.
responsibilities:
- Develop responsive web pages using React.js
- Implement state management with Redux
- Collaborate with UX designers for pixel-perfect implementations
- Optimize web performance and loading times
- Fix bugs and improve user experience
eligibility: B.Tech/B.E. in Computer Science, IT, or related field. Portfolio of web projects preferred.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Join Amazon's data science team to build predictive models and derive insights from massive datasets. Work on real-world problems in e-commerce, logistics, and customer behavior analysis.
responsibilities:
- Build machine learning models for recommendation systems
- Analyze large datasets using Python and SQL
- Create data visualizations and dashboards
- Collaborate with product teams on A/B testing
- Present findings to stakeholders
eligibility: Currently pursuing degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related field. Experience with ML frameworks like scikit-learn or TensorFlow is a plus.

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: Build features for Swiggy's food delivery platform used by millions. Work on both frontend and backend to create seamless ordering experiences.
responsibilities:
- Develop full-stack features using MERN stack
- Integrate third-party APIs for payments and maps
- Implement real-time order tracking features
- Write clean, maintainable code
- Participate in agile sprints
eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech students with strong JavaScript fundamentals. Prior project experience with MERN stack preferred.

title: Android Developer Intern
description: Develop features for PhonePe's Android app trusted by 400+ million users. Work on payment flows, UPI integrations, and financial services.
responsibilities:
- Build new features for PhonePe Android app
- Optimize app performance and reduce crashes
- Implement Material Design guidelines
- Work with backend teams for API integration
- Debug and fix production issues
eligibility: Currently pursuing B.Tech/B.E. in Computer Science. Must have built at least one Android app (published or personal project).

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Work on cutting-edge AI/ML projects at Microsoft. Focus areas include computer vision, NLP, and reinforcement learning for enterprise products.
responsibilities:
- Develop and train deep learning models
- Experiment with state-of-the-art ML architectures
- Optimize models for production deployment
- Collaborate with research teams
- Document experiments and results
eligibility: M.Tech/PhD students in Computer Science, AI, or related fields. Strong mathematical background and research experience preferred.

title: DevOps Engineer Intern
description: Join Razorpay's infrastructure team to build and maintain cloud infrastructure. Learn DevOps best practices while working on high-availability payment systems.
responsibilities:
- Set up CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins/GitLab
- Manage containerized applications with Kubernetes
- Monitor system performance and optimize costs
- Automate deployment processes
- Ensure security compliance
eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science or IT. Familiarity with cloud platforms and Linux systems required.

title: UI/UX Design Intern
description: Design delightful user experiences for Zomato's food ordering and restaurant discovery platform. Work closely with product managers and developers.
responsibilities:
- Create wireframes and high-fidelity mockups
- Conduct user research and usability testing
- Design intuitive user flows
- Collaborate with developers for implementation
- Maintain design systems
eligibility: Students pursuing Design, HCI, or related fields. Strong portfolio showcasing UI/UX projects required.

title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Analyze retail data to drive business decisions. Create dashboards and reports to track key metrics for Walmart's e-commerce operations in India.
responsibilities:
- Extract and analyze data using SQL
- Create interactive dashboards in Tableau
- Perform statistical analysis on sales data
- Generate weekly and monthly reports
- Support business teams with data insights
eligibility: Currently pursuing B.Tech, B.E., or any degree with strong analytical skills. Prior internship or project experience with data analysis is a plus.

title: iOS Developer Intern
description: Build premium iOS experiences for CRED's credit card management platform. Work on a highly polished app known for its design excellence.
responsibilities:
- Develop features using Swift and SwiftUI
- Implement smooth animations and transitions
- Integrate with backend APIs
- Write unit and UI tests
- Optimize app performance
eligibility: B.Tech/B.E. students with iOS development experience. Published app on App Store strongly preferred.

title: Cloud Engineer Intern
description: Work on Adobe's cloud infrastructure powering Creative Cloud services. Learn cloud architecture and automation at enterprise scale.
responsibilities:
- Deploy and manage cloud resources on AWS/Azure
- Automate infrastructure using Terraform
- Monitor cloud costs and optimize usage
- Implement security best practices
- Document cloud architectures
eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science or IT. AWS/Azure certification is a plus.

title: QA Automation Intern
description: Ensure quality of Paytm's payment platform through automated testing. Build test frameworks and catch bugs before they reach production.
responsibilities:
- Write automated test scripts using Selenium
- Perform API testing with Postman/REST Assured
- Execute regression test suites
- Report and track bugs in JIRA
- Collaborate with developers on test coverage
eligibility: B.Tech/B.E. students with basic programming knowledge. Certification in software testing is a plus.

title: Backend Engineer Intern - Go
description: Build scalable backend systems for Uber's ride-hailing platform. Work with Go microservices handling millions of requests daily.
responsibilities:
- Develop microservices using Golang
- Design and implement RESTful APIs
- Optimize database queries
- Work with distributed systems
- Participate in on-call rotations
eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science. Experience with Go or willingness to learn quickly required.

title: React Native Developer Intern
description: Develop mobile app features for Meesho's social commerce platform. Build cross-platform apps serving millions of resellers across India.
responsibilities:
- Build features using React Native
- Implement navigation and state management
- Integrate with REST APIs
- Optimize app performance
- Debug platform-specific issues
eligibility: Currently pursuing B.Tech/B.E. Portfolio with React Native projects required.

title: Cybersecurity Intern

responsibilities:
- Conduct security assessments and penetration tests
- Monitor security alerts and incidents
- Analyze malware and security threats
- Document security vulnerabilities

eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech in Cyber Security, Computer Science, or IT. CEH or similar certification is a plus.

title: Product Management Intern

- Analyze feature performance metrics
- Coordinate with engineering and design teams
- Support product launches
eligibility: MBA students or final year B.Tech with strong analytical and communication skills. Prior PM internship experience preferred.

title: Backend Developer Intern - Python
description: Build trading platform backend at India's largest stockbroker. Work on high-performance systems handling millions of transactions.
responsibilities:

- Implement trading APIs and webhooks
- Optimize database queries for speed
- Handle real-time data processing
- Write comprehensive tests
eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science with strong Python skills. Understanding of financial markets is a plus.

title: Frontend Developer Intern - Angular
description: Develop enterprise web applications for global clients. Learn Angular framework and work on large-scale projects.

- Integrate with backend APIs
- Write unit tests with Jasmine/Karma

eligibility: B.Tech/B.E./MCA students. Freshers with good programming fundamentals welcome.

title: Data Engineer Intern

title: Web Developer Intern

title: AI Research Intern

title: Game Developer Intern

title: Blockchain Developer Intern

eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science. Understanding of blockchain fundamentals required.

title: Technical Support Intern

eligibility: Any degree with strong communication skills. Technical background preferred but not mandatory.

title: Computer Vision Intern

responsibilities:

eligibility: M.Tech/PhD in Computer Vision, AI, or related field. Research experience with CNNs required.

title: Business Analyst Intern

eligibility: MBA students from top B-schools or exceptional undergraduates. Strong analytical and presentation skills required.

eligibility: B.Tech/B.E. in Computer Science or IT. ISTQB certification is a plus.

eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech with experience in Unity or game development. Portfolio with AR/VR projects preferred.

title: NLP Engineer Intern
description: Build conversational AI systems for chatbots. Work with state-of-the-art NLP models and frameworks.
responsibilities:

eligibility: M.Tech in Computer Science with focus on NLP/AI. Experience with BERT or GPT models preferred.

eligibility: B.Tech/B.E. in Electronics, ECE, or related field. Hands-on experience with microcontrollers required.

title: Site Reliability Engineer Intern
description: Ensure reliability and performance of Netflix's streaming infrastructure. Learn SRE practices at massive scale.
responsibilities:
- Monitor system health and performance

- Document runbooks and procedures
eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science. Strong Linux and networking knowledge required.

title: Flutter Developer Intern

responsibilities:
- Develop mobile features using Flutter

eligibility: B.Tech/B.E. students with Flutter projects. Published app on Play Store/App Store is a plus.

title: Security Analyst Intern

responsibilities:

eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech in Cyber Security or Computer Science. Security certifications (CEH, CompTIA Security+) preferred.

title: Database Administrator Intern
description: Manage databases for enterprise clients. Learn database administration, optimization, and backup strategies.
responsibilities:

- Optimize slow queries

eligibility: B.Tech/B.E./MCA with strong SQL knowledge. Prior DBA internship is a plus.

title: AI Chatbot Developer Intern
description: Build intelligent chatbots for customer service automation. Work with NLP and conversational AI platforms.
responsibilities:

- Train NLP models for better accuracy

eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech with interest in AI and NLP. Python programming required.

title: Robotics Engineer Intern

eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech in Robotics, Mechanical, or Computer Science. Hands-on robotics projects required.

responsibilities:

eligibility: B.Tech/M.Tech with knowledge of distributed systems. Hadoop ecosystem experience preferred.
